Ever since the Resident Evil DLC came out. I've grown to dislike this game. They made Nemesis WAY OVERPOWERED and I'm surprised no one is talking about this? 

What Nemesis basically does: Runs fast, whips you even if you're on the other side of the pallet. Infects you with T Virus (which you have to find the vaccine to stop it). Has zombies to annoy the hell out of you which stops you from doing generators at times (Unless you make them chase you far enough to do the generator which by that time Nemesis will be there). He doesn't have I believe his punch melee cool down. He can literally punch non-stop. (Which I think that's a joke). Basically the devs made him OP so you can obviously buy Nemesis (or the DLC pack). Uninstalled and waiting for Nemesis to be nerfed (if they even do it) smh.

I feel this game's main flaw is how it's design has you constantly fight against feeling or inflicting misery.

Good survivors will make playing the Killer feel miserable. Having a killer focus you down feels miserable. Playing a perfectly even match where nobody can close the game out feels miserable. 

By design, there isn't really a way to win besides the one objective you're given, so after a few games you've already seen how it'll play out. Stomp, be stomped or run in circles wishing it was over.

The game shines when you're the one getting away with being the bad guy. But even then, I just feel sorry for the survivors or killers I've toyed with.

Neat idea, but ultimately i'd rather play something where I have fun even in losing.

Been playing this game on and off almost since the beginning (I know my hours might not look like that but that's cause I was a console pleb for a couple years in the middle). It was great back then and I'm only enjoying it more and more now. Especially with the new Resident Evil DLC, for me it changed the feel of the game drastically. I don't know if i've been having good days or what but I don't feel nearly as frustrated when I play Nemesis which is nice cause the ranking system tends to get on my nerves.
Overall though, it's a huge guilty pleasure. I love pretty much everything that comes out for this game (seeing as I have DLC on both console and PC because I make good life decisions) and probably will until the day I die

Искринне желаю  всем разработчикам обанкротиться, что бы ни одна подобная помойка от этих криворуких обезьян больше не вышла

데바데를 끊으면 현생이 보입니다.  블러드포인트 벌려고 게임에서 노가다 하시지 말고 그 시간에 발닦고 양치하고 세수하고 밖에나가서 현금을 벌어서 맛난거 사먹고 윤택한 생활을 하세요. 직장인 분들은 머리식힌다고 데바데해서 온갖 버그와 트롤 요상한 매칭에 스트레스 받아 머리털 다 빠지기전에 직장에서 받은 스트레스 현생 땀빼는 운동을 시작하셔서 건강과 스트레스해소 두마리토끼를 잡으세요. 금빛세포 충전해서 캐릭터 룩덕질 하면서 만족하지말고 현생에서 거울앞에선 자신의 모습을 가꾸는데 돈을 쓰세요.

The community is toxic as all hell with killers and survivors always at each others throats. But in all honesty if you get some friends together and play this game and get good it can be great fun. Its not perfectly balanced but what game ever is.

玩了快50小时，屠夫单边玩家紫八段（我没有吹nb，主要是看了倔巨和193好多年）。推荐新手屠夫开加速器去日服试手，只要会卡好视野藏好红光，日服人皇小地球（手柄玩家）都拿不了我绿段走地怎么样。
    恨推  王中敲小叮当（幽灵杀手）我上紫段全靠他。主要是转点快，技能简单，配上一刀杀有意想不到的效果
前期一定要把毁灭和bbq点出来（主要是现在低段屠夫1挂基本都是2台机了），控机非常非常重要。现在人类很多出生同一个出生地，有时候人都没找到就1台机了。。。。。还有玩屠夫的时候一定心态要好，3跑2跑的事是常有的。
最后祝黎明杀机5周年快乐!
